entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
